skill.name: Nano Image Generator
skill.description: Generate images using Nano Banana Pro (Gemini 3 Pro Preview). Use when creating app icons, logos, UI graphics, marketing banners, social media images, illustrations, diagrams, or any visual assets. Supports reference images for style transfer and character consistency.
skill.summary: AI-powered image generator using Gemini 3 Pro Preview for creating icons, logos, banners, and illustrations from text prompts.
skill.author: lxfater

security_audit.summary: Low-risk Python script that makes controlled API calls to Google's Gemini service. Limited filesystem access to user-specified paths only. No execution of external commands or attempts to escalate privileges.

medium_findings.title: API key embedded in source code
medium_findings.description: The get_api_key() function at line 37-45 returns a hardcoded placeholder value. Users must edit the source file to insert their API key, encouraging insecure credential storage practices where sensitive keys are embedded in source code rather than environment variables.

content.value_statement: Creating custom graphics requires learning complex design tools or hiring designers. This skill leverages Gemini 3 Pro Preview to generate images from text descriptions and reference images, supporting style transfer and character consistency.
actual_capabilities: Generate images from text prompts using Gemini 3 Pro Preview
Apply style transfer using reference images (up to 14 images)
Maintain character consistency across multiple images
Create images in multiple aspect ratios (1:1, 16:9, 9:16, and more)
limitations: Requires a valid Gemini API key (paid service with free tier)
Text rendering in images may be imperfect
Very specific brand logos may not reproduce exactly

use_cases.title: App Icon Design
use_cases.description: Create custom icons and visual assets for mobile and web applications

use_cases.title: Marketing Banners
use_cases.description: Generate professional banners and social media graphics quickly

use_cases.title: Concept Illustrations
use_cases.description: Transform text descriptions into illustrations and concept visuals

prompt_templates.title: Simple Logo
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a minimalist logo for a [business type], [style] style, [color scheme] color scheme

prompt_templates.title: Product Banner
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a website hero banner for a [product/service], [style] aesthetic, [mood] mood, include [elements]

prompt_templates.title: Character Art
prompt_templates.prompt: Draw a [character description] in [art style], [pose/activity], [lighting and background details]

prompt_templates.title: Style Transfer
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate [subject description], same visual style as the reference image, [additional details about composition or mood]

output_examples.input: Create a coral reef scene with tropical fish in watercolor style
output: A colorful underwater scene with coral formations in soft watercolor washes
Tropical fish swimming among the coral in natural proportions
Gentle lighting suggesting sunlight filtering through water
Soft blue-green background suggesting ocean depth

best_practices: Be specific about visual style (flat design, photorealistic, watercolor, pixel art)
Include context and purpose (for a mobile app, website hero, children's book)
Mention composition details (centered, rule of thirds, close-up, wide shot)
anti_patterns: Asking for complex text in images (use text overlays instead)
Using vague prompts like "make it look good"
Exceeding 14 reference images in a single request

faq.question: Which AI platforms work with this skill?
faq.answer: The skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Requires a Gemini API key from Google AI Studio.

faq.question: How many reference images can I use?
faq.answer: You can use up to 14 reference images for style transfer or character consistency in a single request.

faq.question: What image formats does it support?
faq.answer: Output is generated as PNG with correct format detection. You can save to any path and the script corrects the extension automatically.

faq.question: Is the Gemini API free to use?
faq.answer: Google offers a free tier with generous limits. Check Google AI Studio for current pricing details.

faq.question: Why are my generated images blurry?
faq.answer: Use the --size option to select 2K or 4K resolution. Higher resolutions take longer to generate.

faq.question: How does this compare to DALL-E or Midjourney?
faq.answer: This skill uses Gemini 3 Pro Preview with unique reference image features. Each service has different strengths and style preferences.
